encyclopedia.content: heartache ['hɑ:teik] n.1.心绞痛 2.心痛，悲叹，悲痛 n. intense sorrow caused by loss of a loved one (especially by death) 例句： 1 Secret affairs will only lead to heartache.一些隐秘的事只会带来心痛。 2 If the memorize become chip, it is because groans with heatache inside. 记忆如果成了碎片，那是因为里面全部都摆满了心痛。 3Time cannot wipe away the sadness and heartache, but there was never regre

entry.def: Heartache is very great sadness and emotional suffering.
